remarks: Subspace form of orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice.  Compare the orthomodular law in Theorem 2(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 22.  Derived using projections; compare ~ omlsi .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: pjoml $p |- ( ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. SH ) /\ ( A C_ B /\ ( B i^i ( _|_ ` A ) ) = 0H ) ) -> A = B ) $.
